Try "help" to get a list of possible commands.
smb: \> ls

  ..                                  D        0  Mon Jan  1 00:00:00 2024
  file.txt                           A     1024  Mon Jan  1 00:00:00 2024
  document.pdf                       A    51200  Mon Jan  1 00:00:00 2024
  folder                             D        0  Mon Jan  1 00:00:00 2024
